name: Resource.Localization
desc: Defines the explicit type of localization for resources.

items.name: case base
items.desc: A constant that represents base internationalization.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: A constant that represents default internationalization.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes this value into the given encoder, when the type’s RawValue is String.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the localization by feeding the item into the given hasher.

items.name: static func != (Resource.Localization, Resource.Localization) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.

items.name: init?(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

items.name: var rawValue: String
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias Resource.Localization.RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.
